name: Glitchy Retro 🐞🧃 Limbo Panorama
description:
30-10-‎16
5 years ago , inspired by one of my favorite nostalgic Halloween movie I created this.
entirely with trapcode TAO in after Effects, I agree the loop isn't quite perfect but let's call that glitchy. 

OG gif posted on giphy
https://giphy.com/gifs/horror-halloween-after-effects-3oriNQl87GFJNI6D4Y
284,418 Views (on mint day)

It has the keywords and from now on it'll redirect all traffic towards the token (free promo)
If you haven't figured... all my "giphy holograms" do this, perpetually, for your future benefits as a holder.
